newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Liang Court starts new Australia unit.
newsitem.headline: Liang Court starts new Australia unit.

text.p: Property-based Liang Court Holdings Ltd (LCHL) said on Thursday it had incorporated a new unit in Australia to manage service apartments.
The new unit, Liang Court Hospitality (Australia) Pty Ltd, is based in Sydney and has an initial authorised capital of Australia $10.0 million, LCHL said in a statement.

It gave no details of the financing of the new unit, but LCHL said the incorporation was not expected to have any impact on the company's net tangible assets or earnings in the year to December 31, 1997.
